name: flick-carousel
description: Elevate your user experience with Flick-Carousel, a dynamic and visually captivating carousel package designed to bring your content to life! Effortlessly showcase images, videos, or any media in a sleek, responsive interface. With smooth transitions and intuitive navigation, Flick-Carousel allows users to glide through your content with a simple flick of the finger or click of a mouse.
author: renoldkingsely
